title: "Overview"
---

This documentation outlines the creation, execution, and analysis of behavioural experiments using the G3 LED arena setup in the Reiser Lab at HHMIâ€™s Janelia Research Campus performed as part of the <b>Freely walking course control mechanisms</b> screen conducted in <b>2025</b>. 

______________________

The experiment protocol was designed by Laura Burnett and experiments were conducted by Laura Burnett and <b>Aparna Dev</b> from PTR. All fly husbandry was carried out by <b>Edward Rogers</b>.

This documentation includes information on how to [design and run](Freely-walking/freely_walking_how_to_run_exp.qmd) protocols, [analyse]() the data, as well as the [specifications](Freely-walking/freely-walking-rig-specs.qmd) of the arena.

______________________

For clarity, this documentation will centre on how to run and analyse the specific [protocol](Freely-walking/protocols/freely_walking_protocol_27.qmd) that was used in the screen experiments (`protocol_27.mat`). 

Other protocols that were run on this arena can be found within the `protocols` [folder](https://github.com/leburnett/freely-walking-optomotor/tree/main/protocols) of the repository, but they are not documented here.
